title: How to teamfight as Leblanc
body:
Obviously I take out the carries yes but how the fuck do you land chain when there are fuckers everywhere and fuckers are running back and forth and tanks are blocking the carries and support are peeling for the carries.

Like I assume you'd W-Q-R-E-W or W-E-Q-R-W the carries but that chain can be impossible to land some games.

replies.body:
hey, im top 3 lb of oce and I used to do the w q r e combo however lately ive been using w e q r to slow/snare them first as e is the hardest to land ^.^ hope tht helps.
lb is one of the easiest champs to carry imo, just buy pinks/sweepers/ camp bushes and ward a lot so u can make picks while staying safe!

gl

Please refer to standard LeBlanc operating procedures.

Step 1: put your hand on your keyboard
Step 2: now hit EVERY BUTTON AS FAST AS YOU CAN

If you haven't killed all of your opponents, please repeat.
Yeah okay I suppose if you're that weak you can report me. Or you can bait me, whichever one you're attempting to do.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wl908Y9O,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-26T12:15:27.687+0000)
>
> Obviously I take out the carries yes but how the fuck do you land chain when there are fuckers everywhere and fuckers are running back and forth and tanks are blocking the carries and support are peeling for the carries.
> 
> Like I assume you'd W-Q-R-E-W or W-E-Q-R-W the carries but that_ chain can be impossible to land some games._

I AM SORRY BUT THE FUCKING CHAIN HITBOX IS FUCKING BROKEN

JESUS HOLY DAMN CALM DOWN CHARLIE BROWN

I meant in teamfights when there are plebs flying everywhere and it's not broken lol. Morg's Q is broken, LB's E hitbox was already nerfed and it's fine now.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3mzH87upw8E

do a shit ton of aoe and let the adc get the kills to keep the salt in the bag
one of the ways is watching some games, for me i will just W,R, Q E then back

Le Blanc doesnt teamfight in the traditional sense. You want to get behind the enemy or attack from the fog of war with a W+R to gap close on the carries.

You don't siege 5v5 at a turret then when the fighting starts jump in. Le Blanc is more about getting a pick before the fight starts or chunking the carries with a Q+W+R to get them out of the fight.
you want to use your skills and kill people
